Package ca.phon.orthography

Class AbstractOrthoElement

java.lang.Object
ca.phon.orthography.AbstractOrthoElement
All Implemented Interfaces:
IExtendable, OrthoElement
Direct Known Subclasses:
OrthoComment, OrthoEvent, OrthoPunct, OrthoWord
public abstract class AbstractOrthoElement
extends java.lang.Object
implements OrthoElement
Abstract implementation of OrthoElement implementing extension support.
